content: h eart coaster pattern p d f p a t t e r n o n l y in love with handmade @threadoverneedles by saniya & nabeela © 2025 threadoverneedles | all rights reserved h eart coaster pattern materials any worsted weight yarn preferably cotton 4mm crochet hook scissors tapestry needle abbreviations magic_ring - magic_ring chain - chain us crochet treble_crochet - treble_crochet terms double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet - same stitch skill level - the content of this pattern may not be copied distributed or sold as your own you are welcome to sell the coaster you create with this design i hope you enjoy crocheting your heart coaster © 2025 threadoverneedles | all rights reserved h eart coaster pattern instructions start with a magic_ring round 1 - chain 2 3 treble_crochet 4 double_crochet treble_crochet 4dc 3 treble_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch inside the magic_ring tighten the magic_ring round 2 - slip_stitch in chain space 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet 4 double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet 4 double_crochet 2 double_crochet 3 double_crochet double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet slip_stitch in chain space and slip_stitch inside the magic_ring round 3 - slip_stitch on top of the first half_double_crochet single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet * 3 5 double_crochet 2 double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet 2 double_crochet 5 double_crochet 2 double_crochet * 3 3 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch and slip_stitch inside the magic_ring round 4 - slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet * 4 9 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet 9 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet * 4 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet 2 slip_stitch and fasten_off round 5 - attach yarn in slip_stitch with chain slip_stitch in next stitch chain 3 double_crochet in same stitch skip one stitch and repeat till the end slip_stitch in joining chain and fasten_off the completed heart coaster will measure approximately 12cm © 2025 threadoverneedles | all rights reserved h eart coaster pattern crochet chart magic chain slip single half treble_crochet ring stitch crochet double_crochet crochet crochet © 2025 threadoverneedles | all rights reserved
